TextView.android:text:
1). Initially you will be getting 100 seconds.
 2). Create words using letters from the 4 letter grid, for each correctly spelled word, 1 second is added to the clock, the more words you make the longer you can play.
 3). For every three consecutive correct answers, you get a bonus point. Using a bonus point, you can skip a word which you are unable to make.
 4). Each time you enter a right combination of letters you will be awarded 1 point to your score.
